Class ViewAddressHandler

java.lang.Object
adminUserHandlers.ViewAddressHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandler
public class ViewAddressHandler extends Object implements HttpHandler
Handles the HTTP requests for viewing the address details of a user. It retrieves the addresses associated with a user (both billing and shipping), and displays them in a structured HTML page. The page includes options to edit or delete each address.
Author:
24862664

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(HttpExchange he) throws IOException
      Handles the HTTP request for fetching and displaying the address details of a user. The request should contain the user ID as a query parameter. The handler retrieves the user's data, then displays their billing and shipping addresses in an HTML page. If the user ID is missing or invalid, or if an error occurs while fetching the data, an appropriate error message will be displayed.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface HttpHandler
      Parameters:
      he - the HttpExchange object containing the request and response data
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the response writing

    • extractUserId

      private String extractUserId(String query)
      Extracts the user ID from the query string.
      Parameters:
      query - the query string from the URL
      Returns:
      the user ID as a string, or null if not found

    • buildAddressPage

      private String buildAddressPage(User user, List<Address> userAddresses)
      Builds the HTML page displaying the user's address information. The page includes separate tables for billing and shipping addresses, with options to edit or delete each address.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose address details are being viewed
      userAddresses - the list of addresses associated with the user
      Returns:
      the HTML content for the address page

    • generateAddressTable

      private String generateAddressTable(String title, List<Address> userAddresses, String addressType)
      Generates an HTML table for a given address type (either billing or shipping). The table displays address details, including options to edit or delete each address.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the address type (e.g., "Billing Address")
      userAddresses - the list of addresses to display
      addressType - the type of address to filter by (e.g., "billing" or "shipping")
      Returns:
      the HTML table for the specified address type
